column1: Kata Robata////With the rave reviews already being said
column2: the only thing I have to add is if you like Toro this is the place to be.  For my first time
column3: I had the sexy scallop roll
column4: crunchy eat roll (for comparison against my fav roll at kubo's)
column5: toro roll and a couple of pieces of toro.  Awesome toro.
